original: Åkerhielm, Nils Samuel, friherre, överstelöjtnant, Göteborg, f. 22/12/88 i Norrköp. av komm :lantmät., frih. Viktor A. o. Ellen Bennich. G. 20 m. Maja Nilsson. A-B Brand-Victorias avd :kont. i Gbg sed. 37. Chef f. ind :hist. avd. v. Gbgsutst. 23, komm. f. Boråsutst. 34, v. ordf. i Dalhems Väv. A-B i Borås, Kgl. Maj :ts om’b. resp. ordf. i Älvsb. skytte-förb. 24-36, v. ordf. i Riksförb. f. ob^mp. kortdist :skjutn. 30, ordf. i dess Boråsavd. 27 o. numera i dess Gbgs- avd., v. ordf. i Sv. sportskytteförb., ordf. i Försäkr :för. f. gen:- o. huvud-ag. translated: Åkerhielm, Nils Samuel, Baron, Lieutenant Colonel, Gothenburg, born on December 22, 1888 in Norrköping, son of County Surveyor Viktor Åkerhielm and Ellen Bennich. Married on 20 m. to Maja Nilsson. Children: Hans, born in 1921, Bachelor of Economics, residing in USA, Lieutenant in the A.2 Reserve; Eva, born in 1927, university student in Geneva; Elisabeth, born in 1932, university student. Military exams: Passed the exam for non-commissioned officer in Linköping in 1908, officer's exam in 1910, attended the Army Institute of Higher Studies in 1916-1917, General Course Instruction in 1917-1919, rifle inspection course in 1923-1924. Positions: Second Lieutenant in the Älvsborg Regiment in 1910, Lieutenant in 1916, Captain in 1925, Major in the reserve in 1936, Lieutenant Colonel in the regular army in 1944. Currently serving as the head of the Life Insurance Company A-B Thu-les General Agency in Gothenburg since 1936, and the Fire Insurance Company A-B Brand-Victoria's departmental office in Gothenburg since 1937. Also served as the head of the historical department at the Gothenburg Exhibition in 1923, commissioner for the Borås Exhibition in 1934, vice chairman of Dalhem Weaving Company A-B in Borås, Royal Majesty's deputy and chairman of the Älvsborg Shooting Association from 1924-1936, vice chairman of the National Association for Disabled Short-Range Shooting in 1930, chairman of its Borås department in 1927, and currently chairman of its Gothenburg department, vice chairman of the Swedish Sport Shooting Association, chairman of the Insurance Association for General and Main Agencies RSO, RVO, RDDO, Älvsborg Shooting Association, National Association for Olympic Short-Range Shooting, and Swedish Sport Shooting Association, holder of GM, Shooting RM, and others.
